snippet: Another day of reckoning looms for Maria Sharapova when she takes on long-time nemesis Serena Williams in the Australian Open quarter-finals but the Russian can at least head into the match with her serve running hot....
lead_paragraph: Another day of reckoning looms for Maria Sharapova when she takes on long-time nemesis Serena Williams in the Australian Open quarter-finals but the Russian can at least head into the match with her serve running hot.

headline.print_headline: Sharapova Serve Fires Up in Time for Serena
headline.main: Sharapova Serve Fires Up in Time for Serena
